name: Zyxel | ZyNOS | Environment | Temperature Out of Range (SYSLOG)
description: MAC temperature value 132 exceeds its limit temperature value

patterns.value_re: (?P<name>\S+) temperature value (?P<measure>\d+) exceeds its limit temperature value

name: Zyxel | ZyNOS | Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range (SYSLOG)
description: system temperature has recovered to normal state
event_class__name: Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range

patterns.value_re: (?P<name>\S+) temperature has recovered to normal state
